description:
Lady Jai Listing
1954
Piccadilly lounge in the Prince Edward Hotel
• Opened 1922
• Picc-A-dilly lounge opened in 1954
• 1967 raid
• Two were charged with keeping a bawdy house
• 11 men where charged
• 100 people at the party
• One of the men charged W. Courtland was later charged at the Vesuvio bathhouse in 1969 for assault
• closed in 1967, and was demolished in 1976
